content.description: This Route is on the Far left boulder of the Cluster.  Back inside corner facing towards center of the Cluster.  Jam your left 4 fingers in this odd finger deep slot,  Right hand on tiny crimp.  Tops out off to the right side of the corner.  Kind of a tough top out because of crappy holds up higher.  Keeps the blood flowing.  Have a spotter and a pad.
content.location: This Route is on the Far left boulder of the Cluster.  Back inside corner facing towards center of the Cluster.

content.description: Pretty Solid V1.  Follow the Lip that juts out and heads right up to the top.  Pretty Simple.  Definitely Want a pad.  Warm up on this one them do Stick'em up without having to move the pad much.
content.location: This route is on the same face as Sick'em up, just to the left of it.

content.description: This Route is really fun.  If your shorter this may be harder than a V3.  You start with your feet in the big lower pocket and hands in the one just above.  Big stretch to a small crimp/pocket (Careful this pocket could brake loose.) Match and reach/jump to big jug on the left top, match and top out.  You will want a spotter on this route and 1 big pad or 2 smaller ones.  Great fun though.
content.location: You look at the big boulder that is right in the campground exterior fence by the road.  Head like 2 minutes up the hill on the other side of the road towards the big cluster of boulders.  Its on the far right boulder in the back, on the side that faces the middle of the cluster.
